body:
So today I finished Mirai Nikki and I feel like there is no pint to life. Had the same feeling after finishing SAO or Attack on Titan.

Do you guys have anything like these three animes, someone told me something about some gear code?

Thanks

title: Mirai Nikki

replies.body: What is it you are trying to say?
replies.body_tagged: What is it you are trying to say?

replies.body: I know and have seen some of Mirai Nikki, but I don't know what you mean by "gear code".
replies.body_tagged: I know and have seen some of Mirai Nikki, but I don't know what you mean by "gear code".

replies.body:
Do you mean Code Geass? It's really good ^-^
I also recommend you watch Darker than black and Toaru majutsu no index (II)

replies.body:
When I finished The Maze Runner, Harry Potter, Percy Jackson, The Heroes of Olympus, and even The Hunger Games, I felt a little part of me die inside that wanted to live so badly that HE would write another book just so he can read it...

I feel you bro, its hard xD

These are all books btw
